Posts.Content: Aug 22, 2012 10:16AM poisonivyfree wrote: I wish u the best of luck Angie...I have found out through research there is a test they can do on the day of the biopsy that will give a result of malignant or benign so that a person isn't left to worry and wait another 2-5 days. I do intend to request the test at the time of the biopsy and it is known as "frozen section" or "cryosection". Please keep me updated on how you are doing and what ur results are and I will do the same. God Bless
